feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Extensibility

entry.title: In S/4HANA Public Cloud, what is the cds view that contain cost element category?
entry.content:
Dear SAP Expert，

In public cloud
1) What is the cds view that contain cost element category?

2) What is the cds view that related to OP-ECC Function “K_ACCOUNT_ASSIGNMENT_GET”?

Best regards,

Joey

entry.title: How to Mass maintain long texts in SAP S4 HANA Public cloud ?. Any API available?
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Do we have any API or solution available on SAP S4 HANA public cloud to mass update the long texts using text ids etc?

Our requirement is to update Memo /Notes on the real estate contracts in S4 HANA public cloud through a mass upload program.

Looking for possible solutions on this , Thanks in advance.

entry.title: SAP S4 HANA Public Cloud ODATA V4 API throwing 403 error blocked by UCON
entry.content:
We are facing an issue with one ODAT V4  UI type service in S4 HANA public cloud system. Use case is: We have Developed a custom ODATA V4 UI service and created a Fiori elements based UI app in BAS and deployed on BTP Workzone. We have tested this app in Dev system and everything working as expected. But when we transported the same custom service and UI app to Quality system, the ODATA V4 service is throwing 403 Forbidden UCON Blocked error when we try to load the App or load the metadata from browser as well. 

 

Anyone has worked on ODATA V4 UI  API and created a UI app using BTP BAS? Your inputs are highly appreciated. Thanks.

SAP Fiori for SAP S/4HANA

entry.title: Is there an API for MIRO Posting in SAP S/4HANA Cloud (Public Edition 2508)?
entry.content:
We are currently using an RPA process for AP invoice postings (MIRO equivalent) in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition 2508. The RPA solution takes approximately 1 hour for 35 invoices, mainly due to connectivity and navigation overhead.

To improve efficiency, we would like to know:

  • Is there a standard API available in SAP S/4HANA Cloud that supports MIRO-equivalent posting (Supplier Invoice creation with PO reference)?

  • Can we leverage the API_SUPPLIERINVOICE_PROCESS_SRV OData service for this purpose?

  • Are there any specific restrictions or configuration steps required in the Public Cloud edition to enable supplier invoice posting via API?

Any guidance, official documentation links, or best practices would be highly appreciated.

entry.title: How to make storage location field READ-ONLY in CO11N screen in SAP S/4 HANA PUBLIC EDITION?
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts,

Could you please advise on how to make the Storage Location field read-only in the CO11N transaction, under the Goods Movement tab

We would like to restrict manual editing of this field during confirmation.

Any guidance or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your support.

Regards,

Sai Bhargav

entry.title: BADI for marking the block indicator for PO Line item in S/4 Hana Public Edition.
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts

We have a requirement to programmatically set the block indicator at the Purchase Order lineitem level based on certain business logic

Could you please help identify any released BADIs that can be used to achieve this

Thanks in advance

Sai Bhargav

entry.title: How to display custom MIGO fields in Stock – Multiple Materials app (S/4HANA Public Cloud)
entry.content:
Hi All,
In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, we have enhanced the Post Goods Movement (MIGO) screen by adding a few custom fields. These custom fields are used to capture additional details (such as description, values, etc.) during the Production Order against Goods Receipt process.

Our requirement is to make these custom fields visible and reportable in the Stock – Multiple Materials Fiori application/report so that business users can track and analyze this additional information along with the stock data.

We tried to extend these fields to the Stock – Multiple Materials Fiori app via Custom Fields → Data Source Extension, but the data source used in this app does not allow extension with our custom fields.

Could you please suggest the best possible approach to achieve this in S/4HANA Public Cloud?

entry.title: LF-外向交货单的内部传输控制日期和外部传输控制日期的接口
entry.content:
Hi,

使用Scope Item 5D2和5MQ后，过账后的外向交货单，需要在运输页签中填写内部传输控制日期和外部传输控制日期。我需要查找相关的接口，对内部传输控制日期和外部传输控制日期进行批量更新，但是，我无法查找到对应的接口。

相关的帮忙文档资料：

https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/a376cd9ea00d476b96f18dea1247e6a5/1c91cea6720e484d914f8fc36fca84eb.html

 

请问，大家可以提供接口更新，或者批量更新作业方面的资料吗？

entry.title: Custom CDS - Modification After Publishing - S4 Public cloud
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

In S/4HANA Public Cloud, we are working with a CDS view that serves as a primary data source and is referenced by multiple other CDS views.

Now, I need to make some modifications in the join conditions of this base CDS. However, when attempting this, the system asks me to first delete the references from the dependent CDS views before making changes. This would result in a significant impact on our current setup.

Is there any way to modify the base CDS join conditions without having to remove all the references from the dependent CDS views?

Additionally, since we are implementing this for a 100-client setup, I would like to know if it is possible to access and modify this CDS view in Eclipse. If yes, could you please guide me on how to proceed?

Thanks in advance for your support!

entry.title: How to setup authentication in External FIORI APP for Communication User of OData in SAP Cloud
entry.content:
Hi Team,

I have created a new communication arrangement with new user for an Inbound OData Service in SAP PUBLIC CLOUD. I created destination in BTP with SAML Assertion. I created fiori app and deployed on to ABAP CLOUD. Everything is fine. The challenge is end user is already logged into PUBLIC CLOUD and when trying t open app for the first time before loading fiori app Communication User credentials popup is coming. In production there might be N no. of users who use this app. We are struck at a point how to make this authentication happens automatically using End User Credentials or how to setup a streamline for this authentication so that only Cloud Login is enough to load Application automatically. Everything is need to be done in SAP PUBLIC CLOUD not in on-premise.

 

SAP BTP cockpit SAP BTP Security SAP Fiori Cloud

entry.title: Set the batch number to a fixed value for each material (identical to the material ID)
entry.content:
Component：MM-FIO-IM-SGM

APP: MIGO – Post Goods Movement (for Purchase Order)

Business Requirement: Set the batch number to a fixed value for each material (identical to the material ID).

Problem: The batch number is created correctly during the first posting. However, when a goods issue is posted for the same material a second time, the batch field is not filled automatically because the BADI cannot generate a batch number that already exists. We have to enter the desired batch value manually; only then can the goods movement be posted.

Requirement: How can we fill in automatically of this fixed batch value for every goods movement?

Attachment:

First posting:

 

Second posting (same material):

 

Output value has generated but cannot fill in:

 

BADI:  LOBM_AFTER_BATCH_NUMBER_INT

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud - Adobe Forms: Extend data source and layout
entry.content:
Hello,

I have some questions about forms in S4 Public Cloud. I hope you can help clarify my thoughts.

First, I wanted to know if there is a way to extend the data source of a form without having to create customer fields. My customer's requirement is to print data on the form that isn't in the data source. For example, to print data from the related delivery or the intercompany purchase order on the sales order. Therefore, I don't need to create custom fields; this information is already in SAP. I need to extend the data source and dynamically populate this extension with the necessary information. I don't want to create new customer fields in the database.

Another requirement from my customer is to group sales order items by material group. That is, they don't want to print items 10, 20, 30, etc. They want to group by the material group field and first print a header (Material Group 1) and below it all the items in that material group. Then they'll print another header (Material Group 2) and the items in that material group... In S4 Private, I would have developed this type of logic in the print/BADI program, form context, or form interface. But in S4 Public, I don't have any of these options. Can the data source be extended and a completely customized data structure developed by me be added? Are these types of groupings developed directly with Javascript in the Adobe form?

Kind Regards.

Prawin

entry.title: Challenges in Updating Custom Field During PO Creation from Purchase contract in S/4HANA PublicCloud
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

My requirement is to update the Open Quantity (a custom field at the item level). For this, I created a custom field and mapped it to the Manage Purchase Contract app at the item level, after the Target Quantity column.

The logic is: when creating a Purchase Order from the Manage Purchase Contract app, the Open Quantity should be calculated as:
Target Quantity – Ordered Quantity

To achieve this, I tried the following BADIs:

  1. MM_PUR_S4_CTR_MODIFY_ITEM – This is triggered only when creating a Manage Purchase Contract.

  2. MM_PUR_S4_PO_MODIFY_ITEM – This is triggered while creating a Purchase Order from Manage Purchase Contract, but the custom Open Quantity field value is not updating from this BADI.

Could you please share your suggestions on how to update the custom Open Quantity field correctly?

I have gone through some standard documentation but could not find concrete details for these scenarios. If anyone has already implemented a similar requirement, it would be very helpful if you could share:

  • Blogs, SAP Notes, or official references
  • Your implementation experiences or best practices
  • Any limitations or workarounds you came across in Public Cloud

Your valuable inputs will help us in moving forward with this requirement.

Thanks in advance for your support!

entry.title: Does SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Support OCR-based Invoice Document Capture Without Ariba Central?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I have a question regarding invoice processing capabilities in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud.

Does SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud have a built-in feature to scan and capture supplier invoices (PDF or paper format) using OCR technology and import them as documents into the system?

I'm aware that integrating with SAP Ariba Central Invoice Management is one option for this functionality. However, I'm wondering if this can be achieved using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud as a standalone solution, without requiring additional Ariba licensing.

Any insights or guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: How to consume APIs in custom RAP application for SAP public cloud(3SL)
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am currently working on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3-System Landscape) and developing a RAP application using Eclipse with ABAP Development Tools (ADT).

My requirement is to consume an external API (not based on database tables) within the RAP application and expose it as an OData service/UI.

Could you please guide me on the following points:

  • What are the steps required to consume an external API in a RAP application in the Public Cloud environment?

  • Are there any step-by-step guides or examples available for consuming APIs in RAP applications in the 3-system landscape?

Additionally, it would be very helpful if you could share best practices, required configurations, and sample code snippets related to API consumption in RAP for SAP Public Cloud.

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards,
Sanjay

entry.title: AI Demo Ideas for S/4HANA Public Cloud (2508 TDD) - Finance/Accounting Focus
entry.content:
Hi everyone,
I need some advice from the community.

Our customer's executive has requested an AI-focused demo using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud edition. The focus should be on Finance/Accounting or cross-functional processes.

Context: Environment: 2508 TDD system
Constraint: Cannot use other products like SAP Ariba Central Invoice Management
Target audience: C-level executives in food manufacturing/retail industry
My scope: Accounting/Finance modules

What I'm looking for:
An "AI-powered" or "next-generation" demo that:

Looks impressive and innovative
Doesn't require extensive setup (realistic prep time)
Can be demonstrated within standard S/4HANA Public Cloud capabilities
Preferably something other than Joule (looking for alternatives!)

Initial thoughts:

Predictive analytics for cash flow?
Intelligent automation in financial closing?
ML-based anomaly detection?

Has anyone successfully demonstrated similar scenarios? What worked well? Any tips on quick wins that showcase AI capabilities effectively?
Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: OAuth2.0 Authentication for S4HC APIs
entry.content:
Hi Experts,
We are trying to set up non-user interactive OAuth2.0 Authentication for S4HC APIs, to access the APIs from third party applications
Can this be achieved without BTP?
Also are the Standard APIs restricted to use only OAuth2.0 Access code flow? or can other grant types be used?


Cause when I try to set up inbound OAuth2.0 Clients in my customizing tenant, the grant type is disabled and only shows Authorization code + PKCE


And if i were to add my OAuth2.0 Provider, the autogenerated inbound Oauth2.0 clients have the grant type SAML2 Bearer Assertion. Are these the only two grant types that can be configured in the Tenant?
If BTP is my only option, could you please direct me to blogs with steps to set up Oauth2.0 client credentials in cockpit (Cloud foundry) and s4hana cloud instance and finally test from postman?
@Andre_Fischer @Sandra_Rossi @Amin_Omidy @quovadis

entry.title: Add Field in SO Form Template datasource
entry.content:
I would like to add Size/Dimensions field from product master in SO form template.

 I add Size/Dimensions field to SO form template ds via Custom Fields>Datasource Extensions

Then when I download the SO xml file, the field is included but the value is missing. Why?

Is there anything else I need to do?

Best Regards,

Khaing Zin

entry.title: Regarding the Logic of Custom Business Objects
entry.content:
Dear All.

We have created custom fields based on a custom business object. The target for creation is master data (business partner).

While I believe the custom business object allows defining field values, I want it to generate an error during BP registration if any value other than those defined for that field is registered as the custom field value.

Can this be handled using the logic of the custom business object?

If there is another way to achieve this, please let me know.

Best Regards,

Yuki Tsumura
